tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My sincerest thanks to Dr.Shashikanth for helping me tackle a severe respiratory infection. He diagnosed me almost immediately over video consult and prescribed the exact medicines. The doctor was kind enough to explain to me about the medicine he would be giving and how it would work on the infection. After almost 5 sleepless nights because of the extreme cough he promised me that he will make me feel better within 2 hours of the consult. I took his prescription and started to feel better within 1 hr and I was able to rest well after so many days of sleeplessness. Extremely knowledgeable and kind. Thank you very much sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: None
review:
Had consulted Dr. Shashikant about a nerve pain in my left shoulder. He was very friendly; patiently listened to all the symptoms and gave effective medicines. 

His approach to treat patients holistically with dietary supplements and supporting exercises is very helpful and unique. He considered when I said I didn't want to be put on heavy medication. Would definitely consult him again if need be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: You dont always get to meet amazing doctors like Dr. Shashikanth. His expertise in integrated medicine, his passion for yoga, his humility, and his service-minded approach is a blessing for the one who is consulting for well-being. I was lucky to meet Dr. Shashikant! The consultation for me and my family was an experience in itself and we are sincerely thankful to Dr. Shashikanth. His caring approach and his promptness stand out and I would recommend anyone who is looking for well-being need to certainly take consultation him. Thank you once again, Doctor! Also, we thank the staff who was prompt and helped coordinate with the Doctor during his busy schedule to ensure we get our appointment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** **** **** ** *** **** a very good human being. He listens to your problem very carefully and then explains you the probable reasons behind those issues. He will also share his number and will always be ready to help you out of the situation. He is not after money, he will give you advise even after the treatment is over and later you develop some issue. I would highly recommend him to others seeking medical help or diagnosis. He is a Dr who is willing to stretch himself even on holidays. I don't have much words to describe how well he helped me and my family during the Corona infection. Thanks a lot Dr for all your timely help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shashikant is very dedicated, approachable and has provided the best medicine and advice during my covid 19 infection. He believes in Integrated Medicine and has treated me in  the same methodology which has been beneficial in my all round recovery from Covid 19. Helped me to gain physical strength, reduce mental anxiety and reduce breathing difficulties with his advice, suggestions and IM videos. I have referred my friends and relatives to consult Dr. Shashikant for the best advice and medication. Thank you Doctor üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Preventive care of Heart& Lung diseases,
review: I contacted the doctor to get the treatment advise for my father, based on the HRCT scan of my father. Doctor gave me very good explanation of problem and medication required. Not only this, he was very supportive and friendly to give me prompt responses on all my queries that were arising time to time as my father was serious. He gave me even his personal contact and asked me to feel free to reach whenever i need any support. he remotely monitored my father's health and gave genuine advise. I will highly recommend the doctor to anyone looking for good healthcare and peace of mind.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Shashikant for a flu and throat pain, for my mother. He did a detailed diagnosis and then prescribed treatment which was not only apt but also keeping in tune with existing medication that my mother was on. His personality as a physician is very pleasant and he doesn't hurry you up. He patiently listens to all the symptoms and then asked for further details and then prescribed only the medicine that was required. Such doctors are rare! I strongly recommend Dr. Shashikant ** * **** ************* *** **** ******* ************* Much gratitude.
